name: D.P.E Them
description:
This game is a shooting game where you can use the MBT (MEGA BOOST TECHNOLOGY (not main battle tank)) (press SHIFT)to increase your movement speed, slow down time and with your weapons kill your enemies.

Try to reach wave 25.

If you want to pass the time, try it.

CONTROLS :

- ZQSD / WASD : MOVE

- LEFT CLICK : SHOOT

- SHIFT : DASH ( MBT )

Note: Weapons change automatically when they run out of ammunition.

If you find any bugs, please report them and tell me what can be improved.
